effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 40% for 3 turns to all allies
Increase DEF and SPR by 40% for 3 turns to all allies
Reduce magic damage[!] taken by 23.08% to all allies for 3 turns
name: Elemental Power
Elemental Power
元素之力
원소의 힘
Puissance élémentaire
Elementarkraft
Poder elemental
desc_short: Boost DEF, and SPR, and fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance, and reduce magic damage taken for three turns for all allies
提高全體隊員防禦精神、火冰雷水風土光暗耐性的數值+3回合內減輕受到的魔法傷害
아군 전체의 방어력, 정신력 상숭+불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 상승+3턴 동안 마법피해량 감소
Augmente la DEF et la PSY, la résistance au feu, glace, foudre, eau, vent, terre, lumière et ténèbres, et réduit les dégâts magiques subis par tous les alliés pendant trois tours
Erhöht ABW/PSY und Feuer-, Eis-, Blitz-, Wasser-, Wind-, Erd-, Licht- und Dunkelresistenz aller Verb. und verringert drei Runden lang den von ihnen erlittenen mag. Schaden.
Aumenta la DEF, el ESP y la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad, reduce el daño mágico que reciben todos los aliados durante 3 turnos
